channel.title: dip on Cucumber Sandwiches And Tea
channel.description: Recent content in dip on Cucumber Sandwiches And Tea

item.title: 3 kinds of dip
item.description: ( we forgot to take pictures :( ) Ingredients 1 tomato 3 tbsp. mayonnaise salt, pepper Directions Boil water. Put the tomato in the boiled water for a few minutes. Peel the tomato. Cut the tomato into small cubes, removing the seeds. Mix everything together. Ingredients 5 cornichons 3 tbsp. mayonnaise parsley salt, pepper Directions Cut the cornichons into small cubes. Mix everything together.

item.title: Guacamole
item.description: Ingredients 2 avocado (very ripe!) 6 tbsp. lime juice 2 tbsp. olive oil 2 cloves of garlic 1 onion salt & pepper chili powder 1 tomato Directions Peel the avocado. Place in a blender with 3 tbsp. lime juice and 1 tbsp. olive oil. Chop the garlic and onion. Also place in the blender. Add spices to taste. (salt, pepper, chili) Blend! Chop the tomato. Place in the blender.
